Fire Style: Great Fireball Jutsu |viz manga=Fire Style: Blaze of Glory |jutsu rank=C |jutsu classification=Ninjutsu |jutsu type=Fire Release |jutsu class type=Offensive |jutsu range=Short |users=Fugaku Uchiha, Hidari~manga, Itachi Uchiha, Madara Uchiha, Obito Uchiha, Sarada Uchiha, Sasuke Uchiha, Aniki (missing-nin)~anime, Hōki (Watari)~anime, Izuna Uchiha~anime, Kakashi Hatake~anime, Shisui Uchiha~novel, Suika~anime, Victor~anime, Hiruzen Sarutobi~game, Nanashi Uchiha~game, Rōshi~game, Scarlet Blaze~game |hand signs=Snake, Ram, Monkey, Boar, Horse, Tiger |debut manga=7 |boruto=No |sasuke retsuden=No |konoha shinden=No |blue vortex=No |debut anime=5 |debut shippuden=No |boruto anime=No |novel debut=Naruto: Innocent Heart, Demonic Blood |game debut=Naruto: Konoha Ninpōchō |movie debut=Naruto the Movie: Ninja Clash in the Land of Snow |ova debut=Find the Four-Leaf Red Clover! |jutsu media=Anime, Manga, Novel, Game, Movie }} The user kneads [[chakra]] in their body and turns it into [[fire]], which they then expel from their mouth; the more chakra they use, the more flames that are produced. Sometimes the flames lack a distinct shape, being only a stream, but more often than not they take the form of a giant orb that maintains its shape until hitting a target. Upon impact, the fireball is powerful enough to crater the ground and vaporise the surroundings. Against living targets, the fireball can cause extensive burns. The Great Fireball Technique was created by the [[Uchiha clan]], and over time became one of their signature abilities.''Naruto'' chapter 260, page 15 The Uchiha in fact used the Great Fireball Technique as a [[Wikipedia:Coming of age|coming of age]] [[Wikipedia:Rite of passage|rite]], with members not being considered true adults until they learned to perform it.''Naruto'' chapter 223, page 9 In keeping with this, the manga has only ever shown Uchiha using this technique; the anime at times depicts non-Uchiha performing it. == Trivia == * The characters for {{translation|"Fireball"|火球}} also mean "[[Wikipedia:bolide|bolide]]", "[[Wikipedia:comet|comet]]", and "[[Wikipedia:shooting star|shooting star]]". * Several different [[hand seal]]s have been given for this technique during the course of the series: ** ''[[Rin no Sho]]'' lists the hand seals as Horse and Tiger. ** ''[[Hyō no Sho]]'' lists the hand seal as just Tiger.''[[Hyō no Sho]]'', page 162 ** In ''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 4, [[Kakashi]] uses an unknown amount of hand seals in quick succession, using many more than the usual six. ** In ''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 15, Itachi uses Boar, Horse, and Tiger. == See Also == * [[Blaze Release: Great Fireball Technique]] * [[Cat Flame Roaring Fire]] * [[Fire Release: Soaring Flame Bullet Technique]] == References == [[Clan::Uchiha clan| ]] [[de:Katon: Goukakyuu no Jutsu]] [[es:Elemento Fuego: Jutsu Gran Bola de Fuego]] [[fr:Katon - Boule de Feu Suprême]] [[he:ג'וטסו כדור האש]] [[id:Katon: Gōkakyū no Jutsu]] [[pl:Katon: Gōkakyū no Jutsu]] [[pt-br:Liberação de Fogo: Técnica da Grande Bola de Fogo]] [[ru:Стихия Огня: Техника Великого Огненного Шара]] [[tr:Ateş Tipi: Büyük Ateş Topu Tekniği]]
